| HistoryText             = The Weaponeers are a group of arms dealers and weapons experts who use their superior technology to terrorize people and countries.

They first encountered the [[X-Treme Sanctions Executive (Earth-616)|X-Treme Sanctions Executive]] when they assaulted the citizens of the [[Central Saharan Republic]], claiming the land and people under the reign of [[Achmed Al-Khalad (Earth-616)|Achmed Al-Khalad]]. Most of them, including their sergeant, were captured, but some were on a plane with the captain when the team fled, teleporting from [[Samuel Guthrie (Earth-616)|Cannonball]]'s attacks.

[[File:Weaponeers (Earth-616) from Excalibur Vol 3 12 002.jpg|345px|left|thumb|The Weaponeers attacking a family.]]
They were later hired by the [[Hellfire Club (Earth-616)|Hellfire Club]] led by [[Opul Lun Sat-Yr-Nin (Earth-794)|Sat-Yr-Nin]], who wanted to conquer [[Genosha]] by using [[Zanzibar]] as an advance base. They were confronted by the [[Excalibur (Earth-616)|Genoshan Excalibur]], [[Mutantes Sans Frontières (Earth-616)|Mutantes sans Frontières]], and one of its associates: [[Jono Baraka (Earth-616)|Jono Baraka]], president of [[Tanzania]] and also known as the mutant superhero "Askari the Spear". The Weaponeers ended up double-crossing [[Viper (Madame Hydra) (Earth-616)|Viper]] and Sat-Yr-Nin. In retaliation, Viper shot Scimitar in the back, killing him.{{r|Excalibur Vol 3 13}}

During an attempt to take control of the nation of [[Zanzibar]],{{r|Uncanny X-Men #462}} they were confronted to the [[X-Men (Earth-616)|X-Men]] [[Elizabeth Braddock (Earth-616)|Psylocke]], [[Lucas Bishop (Earth-1191)|Bishop]], [[Rachel Summers (Earth-811)|Marvel Girl]], and [[Ororo Munroe (Earth-616)|Storm]]. 

The X-Men were close to victory when the [[Wanda Maximoff (Earth-616)|Scarlet Witch]] [[House of M|warped the reality]] into a [[Earth-58163|mutant-dominated Earth]].

Their currents whereabouts are unknown.

| Equipment               = [[X-Gene]] scanners, high-efficiency psi-blocks
| Transportation          = [[Weaponeer Assault Barge]], Ship with teleporters
| Weapons                 = Guns and swords
